TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EditorPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class EditorPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含一个 控件集合，这些控件用于编辑 控件的属性、布局、外观和行为。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是只读集合的控件，通常由区域用来跟踪的一套区域包含的控件。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by an zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 当 Web 部件页进入编辑模式，且用户选择要编辑的控件时，开始编辑过程。When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins. 区域创建一个新对象组成区域包含的控件。The zone creates a new object consisting of the controls contained by the zone. 在编辑进程中的各个阶段，该区域访问对象保存或检索属性值之间集合中的控件和控制当前正在编辑。At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the object to save or retrieve property values between the controls in the collection and the control currently being edited. 你可以创建的为你自己的编程使用，例如，你需要执行大量操作的一组时的控件集合控件。You can create an collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使对象是只读的你可以以编程方式更改属性的集合中引用的基础控件。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的几种用法类。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有于此代码示例的四个部分：There are four parts to this code example: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自定义的类控件名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，该引用 Web 页中，通过编辑控件。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is edited by the controls. - 引用的网页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，则包含具有多个控件控件从 Web 部件控件设置声明在区域中，并包含一些事件驱动的代码，来创建和操作对象。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains an control with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains some event-driven code to create and manipulate an object. - 在浏览器中加载时的代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 下面的代码示例的第二个部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 请注意该控件具有名为的属性`ContentText`; 此属性保留用户在文本框中输入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. 可以编辑此自定义属性，当控件处于编辑模式，以及标准控件属性。This custom property can be edited when the control is in edit mode, along with the standard control properties. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，``页元素包含三个声明控件。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for three controls. 两个这些控件成为自定义的一部分时创建的对象`Button1_Click`方法执行。Two of these controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 你单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮以查看效果操作的代码创建的控件对象。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the controls that are created by the code that is manipulating the object. 此外，请注意，控件允许你编辑自定义`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性。Also, notice that the control allows you to edit the custom `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property. 这是可能的因为该属性标记为`WebBrowsable`控件的源代码中的属性。This is possible because the property is marked with a `WebBrowsable` attribute in the source code for the control. 如果你更新编辑 UI 中的属性值，必须将页返回到正常浏览模式，以查看更新的效果`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性。If you update the property value in the editing UI, you must return the page to normal browse mode to see the effect of updating the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的空的新实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的空实例类。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 内部使用此构造函数重载类在其方法来创建一个空集合对象。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 然后，区域创建的所有实例控件在子区域模板中，声明和使用内部方法以将它们添加到集合。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection. 不能使用此重载构造函数来创建的新实例并添加控件添加到它。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of and add controls to it. 你必须使用的其他重载之一构造函数相反。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection editorParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的实例类，并传入的集合控件。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 这是一个重载可用于创建一个新的构造函数对象，并添加控件添加到它。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 即使该构造函数创建的实例为只读，则仍可以访问个人以编程方式控制集合中并调用其属性和方法。Even though the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用一种常见情况构造函数将是你想要执行批处理操作时的整个集控件，如更改内容、 外观或一组相关的它们的位置。One common scenario for using the constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them. 使用另一个常用方案构造函数正在开发自定义你想要将与一个服务器控件相关联，以便用户可以编辑对控件的自定义属性的控件。Another common scenario for using the constructor is developing custom controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control. 在此方案中，你的服务器控件必须实现接口，并为该任务的一部分，它必须实现方法。In this scenario, your server control must implement the interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the method. 在该方法中，以使自定义控件编辑服务器控件，必须添加控件添加到实例，如对象。In that method, to enable the custom controls to edit your server control, you must add the controls to an instance, such as an object. 然后你可以将集合传递的控件添加到构造函数来创建一个新对象，其中区域用于将所有控件都设置和开始编辑过程。Then you can pass the collection of controls to the constructor to create a new object, which the zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义，即使集合是只读的仍需执行批处理操作，若要更改单个集合中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom and, even though the collection is read-only, still perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建对象，添加两个的三个网页中的对象，控制，然后创建一个新对象使用构造函数。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, adds two of the three controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它还演示了对基础，你就可以进行更改控件，即使集合是只读的也是如此。It also demonstrates how you can make changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection is read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 你可以加载浏览器中的页和页切换到编辑模式，通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。You can load the page in a browser and switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 你单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮以便查看对两个影响添加到控件对象。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the two controls that are added to the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

param.name: editorPart
param.span: 要测试其是否为集合成员的 。

span.span: The being tested for its status as a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示集合中是否存在 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否特定控件中已被对象。The method determines whether a specific control is already in the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定是否可以使用特定控件处于对象。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether a particular control is in an object. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件不会添加`LayoutEditorPart1`控制转移到对象将添加其他控件时。The code in the `Button1_Click` event does not add the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the object when it adds the other controls. 若要确认`LayoutEditorPart1`控件不在集合中，该代码使用方法。To confirm that the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is not in the collection, the code uses the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the all the controls. 如果你单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，你将注意到的背景色`LayoutEditorPart1`控件是不同于其他控件，因为它不属于对象。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the background color of the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is different from the other controls, because it is not part of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As EditorPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 要包含被复制控件集合的 。

span.span: An to contain the copied collection of controls.

param.name: index
param.span: 在数组中放置集合内容的起始点。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 控件的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，如果你想要创建可以包含一个自定义数组中控制对象，这些控件的子集或超集这些控件。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法用于创建自定义数组的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a custom array of controls. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建的数组控制时，会添加`LayoutEditorPart1`控件添加到数组，然后使用方法以从控件中复制到数组的对象。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an array of controls, adds the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the array, and then uses the method to copy the controls from the object to the array. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果你单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，你将注意到，自定义数组中的所有控件的标题会列出在页面底部附近。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the titles of all the controls in the custom array are listed near the bottom of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 引用集合的一个空的静态只读实例。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态、 只读的、 空实例可减少内存使用量情况下，要空集合的实例通过方法返回正确的对象类型或与另一个对象实例进行比较，但不是需要将成员添加到实例。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

span.span: An that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数，对应于集合中的 控件的索引。

span.span: An integer that corresponds to the index of an control in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，如果你有多个上 Web 部件页，并且你的控件需要查找集合中的特定控件。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来查找中控制对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate an control in an object. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建对象，然后使用方法来查找`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制在集合中，并设置其属性。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, and then uses the method to locate the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control in the collection, and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以将页切换到编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果你单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，你将注意到，`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控件，位于页面底部附近，该控件具有标题但无边框。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control, which is near the bottom of the page, has a title but no border.
